statements: SELECT * FROM biodiversity_hotspots;
SELECT name, location FROM biodiversity_hotspots;
SELECT name FROM biodiversity_hotspots WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM biodiversity_hotspots WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM biodiversity_hotspots ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM biodiversity_hotspots WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, location FROM biodiversity_hotspots WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_hotspots FROM biodiversity_hotspots;
SELECT id, name FROM biodiversity_hotspots WHERE ST_DISTANCE(location, ST_GeomFromText('POINT(50.0 7.0)', 4326)) < 1000;
SELECT id, name FROM biodiversity_hotspots WHERE name LIKE '%forest%' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM hotspot_locations;
SELECT location_name, coordinates FROM hotspot_locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT id, location_name FROM hotspot_locations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT species_name, habitat FROM species_info WHERE population_density > 100 ORDER BY habitat;
SELECT * FROM hotspot_locations WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM hotspot_locations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT location_name, coordinates FROM hotspot_locations WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM species_info WHERE population_density > 1000 ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT species_id, species_name, habitat FROM species_info WHERE habitat LIKE '%forest%';
SELECT * FROM hotspot_locations, species_info WHERE hotspot_locations.id = species_info.species_id ORDER BY hotspot_locations.id ASC, population_density DESC;
SELECT * FROM biodiversity_hotspots;
SELECT hotspot_name, biodiversity_index FROM biodiversity_hotspots WHERE biodiversity_index > 0.5;
SELECT species_name, abundance FROM species_data ORDER BY abundance DESC;
SELECT analysis_date, analysis_value FROM analysis_results WHERE result_id = 1;
SELECT hotspot_id, AVG(analysis_value) AS avg_analysis_value FROM analysis_results GROUP BY hotspot_id;
SELECT * FROM biodiversity_hotspots WHERE hotspot_name = 'Amazon Rainforest';
SELECT hotspot_name, biodiversity_index FROM biodiversity_hotspots WHERE biodiversity_index > 5 ORDER BY biodiversity_index DESC;
SELECT s.species_name, s.habitat_type, a.analysis_value FROM species_data s INNER JOIN analysis_results a ON s.species_id = a.species_id ORDER BY a.analysis_value DESC;

SELECT h.hotspot_name, s.species_name, a.analysis_date FROM biodiversity_hotspots h INNER JOIN species_data s ON h.id = s.species_id INNER JOIN analysis_results a ON s.species_id = a.species_id ORDER BY a.analysis_date ASC;

SELECT h.hotspot_name AS hotspot, s.species_name AS species, a.analysis_value AS value FROM biodiversity_hotspots h INNER JOIN species_data s ON h.id = s.species_id INNER JOIN analysis_results a ON s.species_id = a.species_id WHERE a.analysis_value < 0.5 GROUP BY hotspot, species HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM BiodiversityHotspots;
SELECT id, name, location FROM BiodiversityHotspots WHERE species_count > 500;
SELECT species_name, habitat FROM Species WHERE hotspots_id = 10;
SELECT factor_name, temperature, humidity FROM EnvironmentalFactors WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT research_name, researcher FROM ResearchData WHERE hotspots_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM BiodiversityHotspots WHERE species_count > 500 ORDER BY location DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, species_count FROM BiodiversityHotspots JOIN EnvironmentalFactors ON BiodiversityHotspots.id = EnvironmentalFactors.hotspots_id WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60;

SELECT BiodiversityHotspots.name, Species.species_name, EnvironmentalFactors.factor_name FROM BiodiversityHotspots JOIN Species ON BiodiversityHotspots.id = Species.hotspots_id JOIN EnvironmentalFactors ON BiodiversityHotspots.id = EnvironmentalFactors.hotspots_id;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM BiodiversityHotspots ORDER BY species_count ASC;

SELECT BiodiversityHotspots.name, ResearchData.research_name, ResearchData.researcher FROM BiodiversityHotspots JOIN ResearchData ON BiodiversityHotspots.id = ResearchData.hotspots_id WHERE research_name LIKE '%conservation%' ORDER BY research_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM biodiversity_hotspots;
SELECT hotspot_name, species_count FROM biodiversity_hotspots WHERE species_count > 100;
SELECT observation_id, observation_date, observer_name FROM observations ORDER BY observation_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, researcher_name, affiliation FROM research_projects JOIN researchers ON research_projects.researcher_id = researchers.researcher_id;
SELECT species_name, scientific_name, category FROM species WHERE category = 'Mammal';
SELECT * FROM biodiversity_hotspots;
SELECT hotspot_name, location FROM biodiversity_hotspots WHERE species_count > 100 ORDER BY hotspot_name DESC;
SELECT r.researcher_name, rp.project_name, r.affiliation FROM researchers r JOIN research_projects rp ON r.researcher_id = rp.researcher_id WHERE rp.end_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT s.species_name, s.scientific_name, o.observation_date, h.hotspot_name FROM species s JOIN observations o ON s.species_id = o.species_id JOIN biodiversity_hotspots h ON o.hotspot_id = h.hotspot_id WHERE s.category = 'Mammals';

SELECT r.researcher_name, COUNT(rp.project_id) AS project_count FROM researchers r LEFT JOIN research_projects rp ON r.researcher_id = rp.researcher_id GROUP BY r.researcher_name ORDER BY project_count DESC;
